titles.title: Strategic Petroleum Reserve Anti-Exploitation Act
Strategic Petroleum Reserve Anti-Exploitation Act
To require congressional authorization for the drawdown and sale of petroleum products in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Strategic Petroleum Reserve Anti-Exploitation Act
This bill prohibits the drawdown or sale of stocks in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve unless authorized by Congress in response to a national emergency.
